description.en:
"In a Fight, they say that the first one to bleed from his or her nose is the loser. Father, Mother and Brother…They're all LOSERS that bled from the nose facing that damn monster called WORLD!  
  
I'm not going to fall into that one. Even though I have to break my head, I'm not going to bow my head before anyone. I'm going to finish everyone! I'm going to throw everyone on the ground with the "Ushi Mata".   
Even though my opponent is…a GIRL"   
  
The Boy that doesn't bow his head to anyone…   
SUK DONGMIN

---
- [Original Book <Yes24>](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Search?domain=ALL&query=%EC%95%B5%EA%B7%B8%EB%A6%AC%20%EC%9C%A0%EA%B2%BD%EC%9B%90)

- [Original Book <Aladin>](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=426233)

- [Original WebBook <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/yaenggri)

- [Original WebBook <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=48659)
description.ko:
누구에게도 머리를 굽히지 않는 소년…
넌 웃을지 모르지만 난 한글을 떼던 5살 무렵부터
내가 이 세상에서 한 평생 무엇을 위해 살아야 할까 고민했다.
그리고 내가 처음으로 몽정을 경험했던 어느 날 밤… 
난 널 위해… 평생을 살기로 결정했다. 
네 앞을 가로막는 힘겨운 모든 것들은 그게 어떤 거든 내가 치워줄게...
내가 넘겨야 할 상대가 너라면… 그땐 어떡하지?

---
